scripts.test: yarn build && yarn copy && cd test && yarn exports --test
scripts.copy: rm -rf ./test/node_modules/@cseitz/exports/dist && copyfiles -u 1 'dist/**/*' -e 'dist/test/**/*' ./test/node_modules/@cseitz/exports/dist && cp package.json ./test/node_modules/@cseitz/exports/package.json && cd ./test && yarn install -W && cd ..
